Recent updates in NYC include the first measles case in an unvaccinated infant, a winter storm forecast for Staten Island, and a guilty plea in a plot to assassinate a U.S. citizen, alongside ongoing discussions about housing shortages and public safety concerns.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYC reports first measles case in an unvaccinated infant who traveled overseas. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Wintry mix expected on Staten Island overnight; prepare for possible travel disruptions. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
